jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Get to know us

Wellopta is an online platform founded by experts in the field of Mental Health, who are qualified to provide psychological support and can engage online, for those in need of psychological support. We aim to connect individuals in need with experts who have received qualified training in Mental Health.

What are our working processes like??

We act as a bridge between the clients who apply through our online platform and our Expert Psychologist colleagues, enabling them to match based on their expertise in the respective school of thought. We prioritize the harmony in therapist-client matches and oversee the processes for clients in need of guidance.

We emphasize that our Expert Psychologist team consists of professionals who have completed a Master's degree in Clinical Psychology, have received training in one or more therapy schools, and have subsequently received or continue to receive supervision support, while adhering to ethical work principles.

Wellopta is a platform that offers the opportunity for expert colleagues to work entirely online. Therefore, we provide our colleagues the opportunity to work in any city and on any days within the framework of ethical work principles.

We are looking for Expert Psychologist colleagues who:
- Have graduated from the Psychology undergraduate program,
- Hold a Master's degree in Clinical Psychology,
- Are proficient in at least 1 Therapy School, have received supervision or continue to receive it,
- Have experience in client follow-up,
- Value ethical work principles.

If you possess the above qualifications, we would love to meet you.

Warm regards from the Wellopta Team

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Who Are We?

Hiwell is Turkey's largest online therapy platform, chosen by more than 350,000 clients, with a pool of 1000 psychologists, established to help clients better understand themselves, feel better, and develop a more positive outlook on life. Through our website and mobile application, we aim to bridge the gap between clients and expert psychologists, facilitating the establishment of the healthiest communication.

How Do We Work?

Through our mobile application, our clients can receive services from our expert psychologists more quickly and conveniently. In order to provide the best service to our clients, we work with psychologists who are experts in their fields. Our priority is for our team of expert psychologists to have completed their master's degree in Clinical Psychology or Family and Couple Therapy, to have received or be receiving supervision, and to prioritize ethical work.

Hiwell offers entirely online working opportunities. Therefore, you have the control to work from any city at any time you desire.

- Graduated from the Psychology undergraduate program,
- Holds a Master's degree in Clinical Psychology or Family and Couple Therapy,
- Proficient in therapy practices,
- Experienced in client follow-up,
- Proficient in methods and technologies related to the field,
- Has received or is currently receiving supervision,
- Values ethical principles

If you possess the qualifications mentioned above, we eagerly await your application!

jobListings.companyName: Anadolu Günebakan Special Education and Rehabilitation Center
jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description: We are looking for a psychologist for our center located in the Sultangazi region.

jobListings.title: Cognitive Scientist / Cognitive Psychologist
jobListings.description:
We are looking for a Cognitive Scientist/ Cognitive Psychologist for our fast growing Technology company. This is a full-time and on-site job.

Responsibilities

-Developing valid, reliable, state-of-the-art cognitive measures via VR-based platforms
-Designing VR-based experiences for measuring a multitude of cognitive capabilities
-Conducting in-depth literature search and summaries
-Collecting, cleaning, and analyzing data
-Communicating data analysis results
-Participating in all steps of the product development process
-Documenting all steps of the measure development, data collection, data analysis, and measure improvement process

Requirements

-At least 5 years of experience in laboratory research
-At least a Master’s Degree in Cognitive Science / Cognitive Psychology
-PhD in Psychology, Cognitive Science, or Cognitive Psychology from a reputable university is a plus
-Excellent skills in reading and summarizing scientific literature
-Excellent knowledge of R, Matlab, or Python
-Excellent skills with academic research, statistics, and data analysis
-Excellent communication skills, especially with regards to communicating data insights
-Passion for technology and cognitive science
-Ability to learn assessment techniques quickly
-Good understanding of Cognitive Science literature
-Excellent command of the English language
-Resident in Istanbul (or willing to relocate). Being able to commute to Altunizade

jobListings.companyName: Psikomental Psychological Counseling and Training Center
jobListings.title: Intern Psychologist
jobListings.description:
During the internship period, no fee will be charged from the students.

Suitable students will be accepted as interns for the spring semester. Applicants must submit their resume and motivation letter. Students who meet the criteria will undergo an interview process.

Internship Content:

- Actively involved in clinical operations,
- Capable of generating content on social media,
- Strong communication skills and team player,
- Able to take part in training and events organized at the center,
- Interested in working in the clinical field and with adults.

Interns will be recruited. Details will be discussed during the interview.

Process Information:

* It is important to send your resume with your motivation letter to psikomentalpsk@gmail.com for the evaluation of your internship application. Candidates who do not submit a resume or motivation letter will not be considered.

* Interns who can come on Thursdays and Saturdays will be evaluated. Please include the days you can come in your motivation letter.

Who Can Apply?

- 3rd and 4th-year students or graduates of psychology departments at universities,
- Those who have completed the Psychopathology course,
- Individuals who can commute to our office in Istanbul Bakırköy can apply to the program.

* We kindly request students who are curious about psychology, have a passion for it, plan a career in the clinical field, and are open to learning to apply.

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description: As Milen Psychology, we have opened our office in Izmir Bayraklı for our colleagues who want to see their adolescent, couple and adult clients face to face.

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
TerapimOnline, which fully embraces the principle of adherence to ethical rules and professional standards, has begun recruiting psychologists for its upcoming opening. We prioritize ethical values such as professionalism, reliability, and respect for the rights of clients. We eagerly await your applications, as we evaluate them to add suitable candidates to the TerapimOnline family.

Business Model

Your business model can be summarized as follows:

TerapimOnline is a platform that provides location-independent virtual health services to clients from all over the world. Psychologists can set their own working hours and can work with clients from outside of Turkey. This will enable the realization of Virtual Health Tourism, attracting clients from different countries to the platform. Additionally, agreements with corporate firms will ensure a continuous flow of clients. A flexible working environment will be provided for psychologists, allowing for the expansion of customer portfolios worldwide.

Qualifications

- Bachelor's degree in Psychology,
- Master's degree in Clinical Psychology,
- Experience in practicing at least one therapy approach,
- Currently working with active clients,
- Strict adherence to ethical rules.

If you possess the above qualifications and are interested in working at TerapimOnline, we welcome your applications. You can join us by sending your CV to ik@terapimonline.com.

jobListings.title: Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Yonca Psychology counseling office is looking for psychologists, clinical psychologists, psychological counselors, etc., to work part-time/full-time face-to-face with their own clients!

Qualifications:

Preferably for Individuals Working with Adults; Basic therapy knowledge in approaches such as Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, Schema Therapy, EMDR, Acceptance and Commitment Therapy, etc., and familiarity with relevant psychological tests;

Preferably for Individuals Working with Children; Knowledge of Play Therapy in approaches such as Child-Centered Play Therapy, Experiential Play Therapy, Cognitive Behavioral Play Therapy, Puppet Therapy, Story Therapy, etc., and familiarity with relevant child tests.

jobListings.title: Intern Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Our company is seeking talented and eager-to-learn interns who wish to intern in the clinical psychology department. If you are a student or recent graduate, you can find the opportunity to do an online internship in Rehber Klinik's 'clinical psychology' internship program. As part of our internship program, you will become a part of our family, have the opportunity to get to know our corporate culture closely, and participate in valuable experiences within the corporate environment.

Tasks and Responsibilities

Contribute to the relevant department in areas such as Sports Psychology, Mindfulness-Based Therapy, Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, and Art Therapy.
Participate in the supervision processes of the Clinical Psychology department.
Provide support in the counseling process of the Clinical Psychology department.
Provide support in the corporate communication models of the Clinical Psychology department.
Participate in Clinical Psychology projects and conduct data analysis.

Required Qualifications

Be a student or graduate of undergraduate or graduate programs in Psychology, Psychological Counseling, or Guidance departments.
Possess strong communication skills in interpersonal relationships.
Be inclined towards teamwork and eager to learn.

Note: Since the internship process is online, interns are not paid, and participation in the program is free of charge.

jobListings.title: Psychologist / Psychotherapist (Part-Time)
jobListings.description:
Part-Time Mental Health Therapist (Remote and/or In-Person)
Location: Türkiye (Remote and/or In-Person)
City: Any in Türkiye
Our mission: to eliminate every barrier to mental health.

Spring Health is the leading comprehensive mental health benefit for employers. We help employees understand their mental health issues and connect with best-in-class providers to get the right treatment at the right time.
From early detection to full recovery, Spring Health is the only clinically validated solution in the market proven to be more effective than traditional mental healthcare. By combining the latest technology with vetted providers, we help engage 1 in 3 employees, reduce recovery times, and lower healthcare costs. We are an award-winning, passionate, and mission-driven team with the support of leaders in psychiatry.
We are seeking qualified, part-time internationally licensed psychotherapists to join our provider network and deliver care with a tech-enabled, AI/machine-learning platform that puts patient outcomes first.

What You'll Do
Provide counseling to clients with benefits ranging from short-term goal-focused EAP, to employer health plans allowing as many sessions as medically necessary.
Treat adults who have completed brief, evidence-based online screenings identifying their symptoms and areas of concern.
Preferably, also be open to treating additional populations such as children, adolescents, couples, or families.
Maintain a calendar displaying your availability and complete session documentation in a timely manner within our scheduling system.
Use evidence-based treatment modalities and interventions that are tailored to your client’s needs.
Collaborate with our dedicated provider support team, our licensed clinical care navigation team, and our administrative care support team whenever you need assistance.
Provide culturally competent and empathetic care, upholding our values of diversity and inclusion for all races, ethnicities, and genders.

Who you are

You have an unrestricted license to practice counseling (as a Psychologist, Psychotherapist, Clinical Psychologist, etc.) in Türkiye. We are not able to accept applications from anyone requiring licensed supervision.
Post-graduate experience with at least 3 years of post-licensed experience.
Bilingual Turkish + English.
You're comfortable with technology and are telehealth competent.
You have training and experience in evidence-based modalities of care such as CBT, DBT, EMDR, ACT, CPT.
You are comfortable with providing safety planning and intervention during situations where a client might present with higher risks.
You are committed to quality clinical care and want to expand your capabilities and increase your effectiveness by being informed of client progress or challenges.
You like working independently, but would also enjoy having the support of a team and opportunities for connections and collaboration with other providers and our master’s level clinical care navigators.
If you are interested in / applying to see Spring Health members in person, please be aware that your own office space will be required.

Why you'll like working with Spring Health
You’ll set your own schedule to fit your professional and personal needs.
Work from anywhere, as long as you have a confidential, private location with stable internet.
No need to spend time marketing your practice, checking insurance eligibility, collecting fees, or submitting claims---we take care of the administrative work so that you can focus on clinical care.
Grow your ability to provide effective care through feedback from evidence-based measures that help you identify what is working with your clients.
Join a dynamic community where you will be supported, your work appreciated, and you’ll have the opportunity to help us shape the future of mental health care!
In addition to finding people who are truly excellent at what they do, we take our values at Spring Health seriously:
Members Come First We are genuine member advocates.
Move Fast to Change Lives We build with urgency and intention.
Take Ownership We extend trust and hold ourselves accountable.
Embrace Diverse Teams & Perspectives We find strength in the diversity of cultural backgrounds, ideas, and experiences.
Science Will Win We will achieve impact by innovation and evidence based frameworks.
Candor with Care We are open, honest and empathetic.
Spring Health is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate in hiring or any employment decision based on race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, disability, genetic information, veteran status, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, or other applicable legally protected characteristic. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with applicable legal requirements. Spring Health is also committed to providing reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities and disabled veterans. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know.

jobListings.title: Psychologist / Clinical Psychologist
jobListings.description:
Onlinepsikolog.com is an online counseling platform that brings together psychologists and clients. Through Onlinepsikolog.com, our clients receive support from expert psychologists in written, audio, and video formats. In order to provide the best service to our clients, we collaborate with psychologists who are experts in their fields. Onlinepsikolog.com provides online working opportunities for expert psychologists. Therefore, we offer a flexible and barrier-free working environment where you can work freely from anywhere, anytime, and from any city according to your own schedule (home, office, etc.), whether it's online instant connection or appointment scheduling through your portal based on your availability. If you meet the qualifications listed below, we welcome your applications.

Our Prerequisite for joining the platform:
- Proficiency in Arabic language and ability to conduct therapy in these languages

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Psychology
- Master's degree in Clinical Psychology for those with a Psychology undergraduate degree
- Completion of at least one psychotherapy training program
- Proficiency in Arabic language and ability to conduct therapy in these languages
- If you have studied abroad, a recognition document from the Turkish Higher Education Council (YÖK) is mandatory
- Adherence to professional ethical principles
- Responsible and disciplined
- Strong interpersonal skills
- Proficient in using technological tools
- Positive attitude
- Ability to adapt knowledge and skills in the field to the working environment

Note: We kindly request individuals who do not meet these criteria not to apply and to respect our time.

jobListings.title: Psychological Counselor
jobListings.description:
-Mandatory Requirements

- Have completed undergraduate education in counseling psychology and guidance, followed by a master's degree in the same field OR possess a family counseling certificate,
- Minimum of one year of professional experience in child/adolescent or family mental health,
- Experience in organizing/implementing corporate training programs,
- Completion of training in at least one modality (CBT, schema, EMDR),
- Experience working with clients,

Expectations:
Meeting and following up with clients
Organizing, implementing, and leading directed training programs

Preferred Conditions
- Proficiency in English
- Previous experience organizing/implementing corporate training
- Adaptability to the integration of newly developed methods (such as virtual reality)
- Experience in following client progress through supervision

Clinic Features
- Our family counseling center is licensed in accordance with legal regulations and provides counseling services to children/adolescents, adults, and families.

- All practices conducted at our center are evidence-based and adhere to ethical principles.

Working Conditions
- Employee payments are subject to a commission-based system based on conditions.

jobListings.companyName: Meryem Atik Individual, Child, Family Psychology and Development Center
jobListings.title: Language and Speech Therapist
jobListings.description:
Meryem Atik Development and Psychology Center is a psychology center that provides services for children and adults. We are looking for an experienced speech and language therapist to work part-time/shared office in our office.

Position Content:
Providing speech and language therapy services for children and adults.
Assessing and treating speech and language disorders.
Creating and implementing treatment plans.
Monitoring client progress and updating treatment plans as needed.
Communicating with other healthcare professionals and families collaboratively.

Qualifications:

Bachelor's or master's degree in speech and language therapy or related field.
Deep understanding and expertise in speech and language disorders.
Strong communication skills and empathy.
Flexible and open to collaboration.
Experience working with children and adults preferred.
Possession of professional certifications is preferred.

If you have the above qualifications and want to join our team, please send your updated CV to the email address meryematikpd@gmail.com.
